Others: Joel Embiid, Paul George and Tyrese Maxey all sat out Wednesday night, with varying degrees of physical distress.
Andre Drummond, with an illness, also sat out.
Cleveland gave Jared McCain a bunch of different looks, even played a box-and-one on him at one point.
Donovan Mitchell poured in 11 of his 23 points in the final three minutes as the Cavaliers improved to 13-0.
The Sixers, down three with three minutes left, saw Donovan Mitchell pour in 11 of his 23 points thereafter (including a trio of triples), as the Cavaliers improved to 13-0.
